CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and died on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant had a work - related accident . Subsequently , he received the status of a partially disabled person .

CARDINAL . The applicant 's former employer , the ORG company “ Makeyivvugillya ” ( “ the company ” ) paid the applicant a lump sum accident benefit and awarded him a DATE allowance for his disability .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG against the company and ORG ( “ the Fund ” ) . He sought re - calculation of the above allowances and claimed compensation for losses sustained due to erroneous calculation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court found for the applicant and awarded him CARDINAL NORP hryvnas ( ORG ) , to be paid by the company , and ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL to be paid by the ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Tsentralno - gorodskoy ORG of ORG instituted enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the ORG paid the applicant the full amount awarded under the judgment .
CARDINAL . In the period from DATE to DATE the company partly paid its debt . The judgment remains unenforced .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is summarised in the Romashov v. GPE judgment ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
